text: Djibouti has been in 6 Summer Games. They have never been in the Winter Olympic Games. The National Olympic Committee was formed in 1983. The International Olympic Committee recognized the country in 1984. Hussein Ahmed Salah won a Bronze medal in the 1988 Summer Olympics for the Men's Marathon. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes == References == ==Other websites == *Djibouti at Olympics website * Djibouti profile at London2012.com Category:Sport in Djibouti Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Djibouti at the Olympics
